items.definition: a long, narrow raised part of a surface, especially a high edge along a mountain
if you drain something, you remove the liquid from it, usually by pouring it away or allowing it to flow away, and if something drains, liquid flows away or out of it
a surface that lies at an angle to the horizontal so that some points on it are higher than others
a kind of bush or small tree with red berries (= small fruits) you can eat, that grows in western parts of North America
a stream of water such as a river or canal, or the channel along which it flows
not happening or done often or regularly
very noticeable or attracting attention, often in a way that is not wanted
any wild plant that grows in an unwanted place, especially in a garden or field where it prevents the cultivated plants from growing freely
a small, brown bird that is shot for sport or food, or the meat of this bird
(a building designed to give) protection from bad weather, danger, or attack
